DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess in general population low-dose aspirin and gastroprotective agent compliance and reasons for bad compliance
DOC.brief_title: Gastroprotective Agent Utilization and Compliance in Patients > 60 Years Taking Low-dose Aspirin in France
DOC.criteria: French people > 60 years old, part of Kantar Health Access Santï¿½ panel
